text: Iago () is a fictional character in Shakespeare's Othello. Iago is the play's main villain and Othello's standard-bearer. He is the husband of Emilia. Iago hates Othello and creates a plan to destroy him by making him believe that his wife is having an affair with his lieutenant, Michael Cassio. ==References== Category:Fictional criminals Category:Characters in Shakespeare's plays
title: Iago
